testimonials.name: Iryna Galukhina
testimonials.quote: I had the chance to meet Łukasz during a corporative development training, and I was really impressed of his grasp of programming concepts and how they fit into the bigger business picture. His collaborative spirit, problem-solving skills, and commitment to continuous learning position him as a valuable asset to any team.

testimonials.name: Filip Lorek
testimonials.quote: I highly recommend Lukasz as a valuable, hardworking software developer. He's invaluable and honest team member who supports his colleagues in any situation.

testimonials.name: Ielyzaveta Lissova
testimonials.quote: I had the pleasure of working closely with Łukasz during his participation in the Technology Academy. Łukasz consistently demonstrated a high level of responsibility and attentiveness. His dedication to learning and professional growth was evident in every task he undertook.

testimonials.name: Nandun Senevirathna
testimonials.quote: During our collaboration in a project with the University of Twente as a project partner, I had the opportunity to work alongside Lukasz. Demonstrating exemplary dedication and strong collaborative skills, he adeptly navigated challenging circumstances, showcasing his proficiency as a team player.

testimonials.name: Zbigniew Wesołowski
testimonials.quote: Lukasz and I worked together when he was at Streamsoft. He is an exceptionally hard worker who works well with others even in challenging situations. He is a team player with a strong sense of responsibility and I am sure he would be an asset to any team.
